product: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Daily Moisturizer Face Cream with Ceramide and Niacinamide for All Skin Types, Oil Free, Fragrance Free
title:
2.0 out of 5 stars
Harsh for Sensitive Skin.
body: This product was recommended by several You-Tube Dermatologists and very well endorsed, unfortunately, the formulation causes irritation, drying and peeling especially around the eyes.  This is the 2nd tube I've purchased and now realize its much to harsh due to the Niacinamide and Ceramides used in the formulation.  Both of which I'm sensitive to and found that out the hard way. There's a good reason why the high-end moisturizers and creams are better tolerated on the skin especially when using Niacinamide and Ceramides. Drug store brands need to be carefully used especially on mature skin.

product: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Daily Moisturizer Face Cream with Ceramide and Niacinamide for All Skin Types, Oil Free, Fragrance Free
title:
2.0 out of 5 stars
Didn't work for me
body: I have very dry patches of bumpy skin on my cheeks from keratosis pilaris. Very few products work. I tried this and saw no improvement in the bumps. On the bright side, it does tend to pill and I used it to pill and exfoliate my face. I put the lotion on, let it set, then cleanse my face really well and then some dead skin comes off. Hence why I give it 2 stars, not 1. It isn't perfumed and has a negligible medicinal scent. The tube doesn't last too long (less than a month for me with pretty minimal amounts used every evening) and seems expensive for how much product you really get. I think it's worth a try but doesn't work for kp sufferers. I had better luck with Hydroboost by Neutrogena or the gel moisturizer by Clinique.

product: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Daily Moisturizer Face Cream with Ceramide and Niacinamide for All Skin Types, Oil Free, Fragrance Free
title:
2.0 out of 5 stars
I wanted to love it
body: I stated using this to help with my flaking skin from my prescription retinols.  I tossed all my other moisturizers with fragrance and that weren‚Äôt working and committed to this.  My flaking has stopped but I believe it‚Äôs more to do with changing my face wash. This pills horribly. For the price it doesn‚Äôt feel luxurious on my skin and I‚Äôm not sure it‚Äôs even worth it. I have to put on a soaking wet face after a shower or warm face wash to get it to even absorb just a bit.  Forget about layering with anything else or makeup. I‚Äôll be returning it and trying something else instead.Edit to add: I read some other reviews and decided to buy a bottle at target.  NO PILLING! With the Amazon one I had to go through this whole ritual of washing my face, leaving it damp, putting in the LP cream, letting it dry and adding my retinol cream. I had to cut out any serums after that.With the target one I did my ritual with good results. Then I decided to just go ahead put on my LP cream (it absorbs faster and doesn‚Äôt just sit on my skin) wait a second, put on my retinols, and added my serum back info my routine. No pilling again. Maybe the Amazon version is old or coming from a different facility.

product: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Daily Moisturizer Face Cream with Ceramide and Niacinamide for All Skin Types, Oil Free, Fragrance Free
title:
2.0 out of 5 stars
Not for all users with rosacea
body: I recently found out that I have rosacea, and after going through all these recommended products for rosacea, someone was raving about La Roche-Posay moisturizer. I was really excited to try this out since I found out 90% of my skincare products were just a big no for me now. Well, let me tell you, other rosacea sufferers, that this moisturizer is just not for everyone. Here's why.This moisturizer stings - yes, it stings! Like, ouch! Upon applying it on my face that was washed with a sensitive-skin friendly cleanser, I put a dab of this moisturizer on my face and could feel it starting to sting. Then, the rosacea would appear brightly on my face. On top of that, my face felt extremely oily as if it was from this moisturizer. Now, the moisturizer does say that it's oil-free; however, it really didn't feel like it.One plus thing about this moisturizer is that after applying it on my face, I didn't have any more of that itchiness. I do think it is doing its job as moisturizing, but it's also triggering my rosacea.Also, if anyone is using the Cetaphil sunblock along with this moisturizer, I do advise you to use it with care. I'll write a review for that sunblock, but these two do not mix well.

product: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Daily Moisturizer Face Cream with Ceramide and Niacinamide for All Skin Types, Oil Free, Fragrance Free
title:

body: As someone with sensitive skin who‚Äôs used this product for many years, I can vouch for this being an excellent and reliable moisturizer. A little goes a long way with this one, so the bottle should last you for a while. 5 stars for the product itself.That being said, I‚Äôm giving my Amazon order 2 stars ONLY because it arrived on time and was the correct product.I ordered this off of Amazon as a gift for a friend, but the outside packaging was battered and torn. It actually looked like it had been opened. I had to return it because there‚Äôs no way I could gift something that arrived in terrible condition that could‚Äôve been tampered with. My advise? Ordering this on Amazon is risky. You can always pick this up at your local CVS for about the same price.

product: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Daily Moisturizer Face Cream with Ceramide and Niacinamide for All Skin Types, Oil Free, Fragrance Free
title:
2.0 out of 5 stars
May be others' cup of tea, but not mine
body: The only reason I dislike this moisturizer so much is because of the rolling. Like, if you move your fingers across your face or try to swipe on makeup, it looks like your skin's peeling off...I liked it initially because it goes on very light and SEEMED to absorb well. My skin felt moisturized, but anytime I put on makeup or rubbed my skin, it looked like I recently got a facial peel. I thought at first it was another product I was using, but after I stopped using the other product, my skin didn't stop looking like it was peeling after putting on moisturizer. Over time I've realized that it's just the moisturizer rolling off, not my skin, and underneath it, my skin doesn't actually feel that moisturized after all (once the moisturizer rolls off). It appears to absorb very well, so it's hard to tell how much you've put on. If you put on very, very little, you won't have the peeling. But, you also won't have any moisturizing. It's a catch 22.Pros: absolutely for sensitive skin - I had no problems with it ACTUALLY peeling my skin or anything crazyPeople seem to like this, so maybe it's just me, but it's an expensive moisturizer that just peels off and doesn't seem to do much.

product: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Daily Moisturizer Face Cream with Ceramide and Niacinamide for All Skin Types, Oil Free, Fragrance Free
title:
2.0 out of 5 stars
This is a sunscreen with moisturizer, not a moisturizer with sunscreen.
body: Update: it's as I feared.  This product is too thick and greasy, never fully absorbs into the skin and you cannot put makeup over it without pilling.  I did not see any changes to my skin.  I will not be purchasing this product again.I will come back later to update, but on arrival I am disappointed because this product is not what I wanted. I wanted a facial moisturizer with spf, as advertised, but this is a sunscreen with moisturizers.I know that some will think it's the same thing or I'm being petty, but they are completely different things. The thickness and the way sunscreen absorbs vs a moisturizer with spf is night and day. Sunscreen tends to pill under makeup as well while moisturizers are better designed to be used in layers on the face. This is thicker and greasier feeling than I wanted.I am definitely willing to give it a shot and I hope I eat my words, but I really also hope that the seller advertises it as sunscreen because that's what it is.I'll be back in a month to update!

body: UPDATE: this update is a few months late, but I did hear back from their customer service. They first told me to try the product without using any toner or oil underneath. Then they said to go to  dermatologist and get my skin checked. Apparently it‚Äôs a product that can only be used by people with perfect skin. I have pretty good skin, and I‚Äôve never had this problem with any other moisturizer. What a shame. Don‚Äôt buy this project.Original Review-I used to love La Roche-Posay. I‚Äôve been using their cleansers for a long time. I wanted to give their moisturizer and their sunscreen a try, but I am very disappointed. Like other reviews, this product causes a lot of pilling. I‚Äôm only able to use this on my face right now because of the quarantine I don‚Äôt go out much. Don‚Äôt use this moisturizer with makeup. Prior to writing this review I reached out to their customer service asking if it‚Äôs an old moisturizer or I should use a different product, but I got no response. I also got their melt-in sunscreen from cvs and that was also disappointing. Super greasy and its definitely not meant to be used with makeup. Unfortunately I can‚Äôt return it due to covid19 restrictions. I really wanted to love this brand, but I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôll get their products anymore.

body: I purchased it for the days that my skin is sensitive from using Retin A & bc it got good reviews on insta but it doesn‚Äôt feel moisturizing and pills if you use too much. May Lindstrom‚Äôs Blue Cocoon is UNMATCHED (it‚Äôs also very expensive) for soothing inflamed skin. Will go back to using that. You absolutely get what you pay for with May Lindstrom, her products are phenomenal.  Will not be purchasing this again & will use the rest of it on my body.

product: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Daily Moisturizer Face Cream with Ceramide and Niacinamide for All Skin Types, Oil Free, Fragrance Free
title:
2.0 out of 5 stars
Nope. It  Balls Up On The Skin
body: I wanted to like this. I tried it a few times and it balls up on the skin. I did use it over products, but it didn't matter if I put it on right after applying serums, or if I waited over an hour and then applied this product. It still balls up and flakes. Yuck. I can't use this. I'll stick with my PM Cerave lotion which is an awesome product and doesn't ball up on the skin.

product: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Daily Moisturizer Face Cream with Ceramide and Niacinamide for All Skin Types, Oil Free, Fragrance Free
title:
2.0 out of 5 stars
Too Greasy
body: This product would be fine for a day at the beach, but it is too thick to wear everyday, especially under makeup. I use the smallest amount, and it still makes my face very greasy. I do have sensitive skin, and this product does not irritate my skin.

product: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Daily Moisturizer Face Cream with Ceramide and Niacinamide for All Skin Types, Oil Free, Fragrance Free
title:
2.0 out of 5 stars
Is not absorbed into skin
body: However this moisturizer may be beneficial for your facial skin it defeats the purpose when it does not absorb into the skin. After applying, this moisturizer leaves many very visible small clumps of product on your skin.After trying various ways to alleviate this problem, using different toners, no toner, less product etc, nothing helps, it still does not absorb into skin.Horrible waste of money.

product: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Daily Moisturizer Face Cream with Ceramide and Niacinamide for All Skin Types, Oil Free, Fragrance Free
title:
2.0 out of 5 stars
Perfect if you like lotion that "pills" up all over your face
body: I wanted to love this moisturizer after seeing it recommended by various YouTube personalities and reading the reviews on Amazon. It's a good moisturizer when used by itself, with no other products. However, when I apply this on top of anything else...serums, Vitamin C, tretinoin...the moisturizer pills terribly! There are flaky white bits all over my face and I feel like it's pulling off everything I just put on my face. I contemplated throwing it out but I think I'll repurpose it for hand/foot cream until it runs out. I will not buy this again.

product: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Daily Moisturizer Face Cream with Ceramide and Niacinamide for All Skin Types, Oil Free, Fragrance Free
title:
2.0 out of 5 stars
It's a basic moisturizer
body: It tends to pill up on the skin if you even put just barely too much on so it doesn't work great under makeup.  There are better moisturizers out there for the same price.
